titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, International Division, Population Program
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, International Division, Population Program FA1691

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-01 04:03:39 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, International Division, Population Program

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of program files, project files, and office files.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type, field office, or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
